alert.note: Alert for Cass; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 11:58PM CDT until May 07 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cass County in west central Illinois... South central Schuyler County in west central Illinois... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1157 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bluff Springs, or near Beardstown, moving east at 45 mph. Another severe storm was located 5 miles northwest of Beardstown, also moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Virginia around 1210 AM CDT. Chandlerville around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ashland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
